```{r data}
speed <- read_csv("speeding_tickets_text.csv") %>% 
  clean_names()
```

### (a)

```{r part_a}
speed %$% 
  lm(amount ~ age) %>% 
  get_regression_table()
```

### (b)

```{r part_b}
speed %$% 
  lm(amount ~ age + mp_hover) %>% 
  get_regression_table()
```

### (c)

```{r part_c}
speed %>% 
  top_n(1000) %$% 
  lm(amount ~ age + mp_hover) %>% 
  get_regression_table()
```
